org.pojava.lang
Class BoundString

java.lang.Object
  org.pojava.lang.BoundString

public class BoundString
extends Object

A BoundString represents a String with Bindings. Each binding is represented by a placeholder mapped sequentially to a list of Binding objects.

Author:
John Pile

Constructor Summary

          Construct an empty BoundString.
BoundString(String str)
          Construct a BoundString from a String.

public String toString()
